description: A joint concert for Mami and Megumi has been planned for Isohama Beach. Yuu is worried about having to stay there for two nights, but after throwing a tantrum she convinces her parents to go. The night of the concert, Megumi plays a trick on Mami by suggesting a duet with an audience member: Yuu! Yuu is shocked, but manages to pull it off with a few tricks.

titles.title: 渚のミラクルデュエット
